Santorum: s claim that the EPA director under Obama said the Clean Power Initiative would have no effect on man-made CO2 emissions.
The exchange between Rep: Lamar Smith and Obama EPA Administrator Gina McCarthy at a House Science Committee hearing, where Smith questioned the justification for the Clean Power Plan and mentioned former Obama Administration Assistant Secretary Charles McConnell's statement that it would only reduce global temperature by 1/100th of a degree Celsius.
